ModMetaData.name: Vanilla Textures Expanded - Genetic Rim
ModMetaData.author: Oskar Potocki, Sarg Bjornson, Luizi
ModMetaData.description:
<size=24>Features</size> Vanilla Textures Expanded - Genetic Rim is a full-scale overhaul of Genetic Rim textures, with its main aim being improving the quality of the artwork and make it more in-line with textures of Vanilla game and Vanilla Expanded mod series.
This texture pack includes over 550 textures remade in vector-based software (same method used for Vanilla Expanded mods and vanilla game), exported into higher resolution for a cleaner, more sophisticated outcome.
When redrawing the Genetic Rim textures, our main focus was on keeping them consistent with what players are used to - We only applied drastic changes to artworks that werenâ€™t as logical or aesthetically pleasing. The way we did it, is we analyzed the animals that create a given mutation, and then applied their traits onto a new creature.
<size=24>Issues</size> Giddy-Up Saddles in some creatures will need to be redone from scratch. This will be worked on at a later date, since it is a ton of work
<size=24>Plans for the future</size> - Textures for the Dinosauria, Megafauna, and Alpha Animals patches redone
<size=24>Compatibility</size> Since this is a texture mod it should be compatible with almost everything
<size=24>Changelog</size> v1.6: Added Megafauna patch animals (01/04/21) v1.5: Added Dinosauria patch animals (31/03/21) v1.4: Added Alpha Animals patch animals (30/03/21) v1.3: Added graphics for items for all GR patches (16/10/20) v1.2: Updated for RimWorld 1.2 (11/08/20) v1.1: Added graphics for the Cosmic Horrors Patch (16/06/20) v1.0: Release (23/05/20)
